de.schenk.jrtrace.annotations

Enum XClassLoaderPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<XClassLoaderPolicy>
      • de.schenk.jrtrace.annotations.XClassLoaderPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<XClassLoaderPolicy>

    public enum XClassLoaderPolicy
extends java.lang.Enum<XClassLoaderPolicy>
    The enumeration of options for the ClassLoader to use when loading injected classes. The default value is BOOT.

    TARGET: the injected code is loaded using the ClassLoader of the target class (the class into which the code is injected). As a consequence, if the same code is injected in different classes that use different ClassLoaders multiple Class objects and Objects are created, one for each ClassLoader.

    BOOT: the injected code is loaded using the root ClassLoader null. Code injected with the root ClassLoader will only have access to the core java and the few libraries directly loaded into the boot class path

    NAMED: an arbitrary class can be specified using XClass.classloadername(). When the code is injected the ClassLoader of this class is identified and used to load the injected code.

    Author:
    Christian Schenk
